Today, Dan and Jordan take a look at the Sunday episode of The Alex Jones Show. In this installment, Alex does running commentary over Trump's speech at CPAC, and airs one of the most bewildering commercials Dan has ever heard.

==Tidbits==

*Alex sits out CPAC
*Trump is the real president
*Alex plays Trump's CPAC speech with commentary
*Rush is watching CPAC from heaven
*Trump isn't going to start a new party
*GCN commercial: Antichrist DNA and iron poisoning
*Smart people aren't wearing masks at CPAC
*Trump implies he's still president
*Alex isn't bragging, but Rush listened to him every day
*Viewers request the return of racist dragon impression
*Australian editorial video: Obama got the Nobel prize for being black
*CPAC speakers: Please wear a mask
*clip: Alex knew about [[Operation Lockstep]] in 2010, didn't keep talking about it
